Wed, 20 Nov 2024 23:16:54 +0000 Nazia Hai, 27, died on Sept 11, 2023, following an incident at a Te Atatū Peninsula, West Auckland home. Ex-partner Jaykob Tutai later pleaded guilty to her murder.
